title: La Casa de Cervantes
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Mexican, Fusion, Guatemalan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the city's historical center behind the palace is a cultural house made up of a restaurant, bookstore, fair trade store, galleries, and an NGO office. The menu offers vegan choices which include a roasted red pepper & avocado sandwich, plus others. The atmosphere is cozy.
